abstract: The Obama administration, struggling to get the housing market running again for low-income and first-time homebuyers, will lower the premium that the Federal Housing Administration charges on mortgage insurance, administration officials said Wednesday.
snippet: The Obama administration, struggling to get the housing market running again for low-income and first-time homebuyers, will lower the premium that the Federal Housing Administration charges on mortgage insurance, administration officials said...

headline.main: To Lift Market, Obama Will Lower Mortgage-Insurance Cost
